events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin review shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department as a software development candidate.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application moving forward.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully to assess your technical background and experience.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening outcome; you have expressed continued interest in the position.
We have successfully scheduled your technical interview for next week with our senior software engineers.
The technical interview has been completed and your coding skills and problem-solving abilities were impressive.
Your HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and other employment details.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and the team is enthusiastic about your fit for the company.
An official offer has been proposed, including salary details and benefits tailored to your expectations.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your eagerness to join the engineering team.
You have formally accepted the offer to join our software engineering team. Welcome aboard!
The onboarding process has begun with orientation sessions and setup of your development environment.
Your hiring process is now officially closed. We look forward to your contributions as a software engineer.
